text: I can only imagine how difficult lockdowns been there

I really enjoyed this post Emma. So true that feeling of being connected to ‘strangers’online. Joe Wicks starts our day here too. What a sweet guy who is brightening the lives of millions. It’s all about looking at the small things right now. We went to the Botanical gardens today and I saw a women taking photos of the plants and lizards and I thought that was awesome. Small things can make a big difference. So glad you are writing these posts. Insightful and honest! I am dreaming about Bali! We will get our holidays eventually and when we do they will be fabulous!!!!!!

Brilliant read Emma 🌟 It struck home how much we’ve all got in common no matter where we live (resisting the urge to start Happy Hour 🙈😂). As a fellow travel addict, I’m struggling with a feeling of constant claustrophobia- not being able to just ‘go’ is one of the hardest things for me! Sending lots of love ❤️

answers.text: @travellingwithmygirls thanks so much! I really am struggling with the lack of travel claustrophobia too!!! One day we will travel again 😘
